home.parrafo-info: Information Technology student, passionate about web development. I aim to create projects and solutions that provide the best user experience.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am a self-directed learning enthusiast, currently studying Full-Stack Development at Digital House. My aim is to secure a position in the IT field to gain experience, expand my knowledge, and bolster my professional career. I am a creative, empathetic, and enthusiastic individual with strong abilities in teamwork, effective communication, and problem-solving. Responsible and proactive, I enjoy learning from others and consistently pushing my limits.
